text: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا
translation: Yahya amaze kuvuka akagera mu bigero, Imana Allah yamutegetse Iti: “Ewe Yahya! Fata nkama Igitabu ca Tawurati, ugitahure wongere ukigendere”. Twebwe Allah, Twaranamuhaye kuva akiri umwana muto, uburyo bwiza bwo gutahura ingingo no kuzishira mu ngiro;
